<!--Code-->
Code: ```10021 (0x2725)```
<!--Text-->
Text: ```"The server detected that the network gateway executable (scnetworkgateway.exe) unexpectedly terminated."```
<!--AutoGenerated/-->
### Description
_There is currently no further description available._
### Example
_There is currently no code example available on how to reproduce error 10021. Please modify the code below in a way that can describe how to produce this error._

```csharp
using Starcounter;
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main(string[] args) {
        // Foo can not be successfully invoked if PreFoo() is not
        // invoked previously. If Foo() is called like this, it will
        // generate an error 10021.
        Db.Foo();
    }
}
```

### Resolution
_There is currently no code example available on how to remedy error 10021. Please modify the code below in a way that can describe how to remedy this error._

```csharp
using Starcounter;
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main(string[] args) {
        // We call PreFoo() prior to calling Foo(). Now, we will
        // no longer experience error 10021.
        Db.PreFoo();
        Db.Foo();
    }
}
```
